Since October 2011, THKMC was incorporated as a charity with an IPC status to provide multiple social and welfare services to the community at large. THK Elderly Services Division provides many programmes and services to serve the elderly in need ‚Äì one of which includes THK Cluster Support. THK Cluster Support provides social support through case management, monitoring, and basic counselling services to vulnerable seniors, and facilitates coordination in the provision of community-based care and support services to the seniors. This service aims to improve the quality of life of vulnerable seniors, particularly for low or no income seniors who are socially-isolated and have minimal or no family support.

name: Adult Diapers
description: Mdm Ang is an elderly client known to Thye Hua Kwan Moral Charities (THKMC). She had dementia and has to rely on diapers. She lives with her spouse and son whom both are not working. THKMC is looking for donation of Size L diapers, around 1-2 months supply. If you know of someone who has the items for donation, please contact Choy Xue Min at 88554829. Since October 2011, THKMC was incorporated as a charity with an IPC status to provide multiple social and welfare services to the community at large. THKMC provides assistance to the Elderly, Families, Children & Youth, and Persons with Disabilities, through more than 70 programmes and services. THK Elderly Services Division provides many programmes and services to serve the elderly in need ‚Äì one of which includes THK Cluster Support. THK Cluster Support provides social support through case management, monitoring, and basic counselling services to vulnerable seniors, and facilitates coordination in the provision of community-based care and support services to the seniors. This service aims to improve the quality of life of vulnerable seniors, particularly for low or no income seniors who are socially-isolated and have minimal or no family support.
